properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 1 at 2:20AM MST until February 2 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Boise ID
properties.description:
...WINTER STORM MOVING IN SUNDAY MORNING...

.A winter storm system will move in Sunday morning, bringing a
strong cold front with rain that will rapidly change to snow over
a large area along and near the Nevada border. In Malheur County,
the advisory covers much of the southern half of the county. Most
of Owyhee County is in the advisory, as is most of the southern
half of Twin Falls County. Winds will gust over 20 mph over most
of these same areas, creating blowing snow which will drift over
roadways. The snow will progress from west to east through Sunday
and into Sunday night.

* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3
inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph.

* WHERE...Southwest Highlands zone.

* WHEN...From 11 AM to 11 PM MST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing
snow could significantly reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 11 PM MST SUNDAY
